answers.answer: I do the same thing. I am now 38w 1d and have some complications. Preeclampsia, pupps and swelling. they are inducing me on the 26th at 39weeks. I am always scared of something going wrong. But I know it most likely wont. Just try to stay as positive as you can.

i hear ya, hun, but it truly is normal. every pregnant woman worries! just try not to let it get out of control. pregnancy is a time of uncertainty and waiting, but take comfort in the fact that statistically the odds that you will deliver a healthy baby are very high compared to other outcomes. take care.

thank u, I know its irrational sometimes and I try to ignore it but it is getting to the point where I am struggling to enjoy my pregnancy and just want it to be over. I just pray that she is going to be okay x

question: hey guys,I am 29 weeks and 1 day and I am absolutely terrified of my baby dying. I have been like this since I got pregnant. I never thought I would actualy get to meet my baby. I am so paranoid that something is going to happen to her like an accident with her cord. I cant stop thinking it and its starting to get me down please help
title: scared
